name: Bad Fish Day
description:
PLANNED UPDATE will be coming  featuring:

  • New Maps
  • New Enemies
  • Sound!
  • New Weapons 
  • Art completely re-done
  • Secrets?

What's more important when surviving hordes of invisible killer fish, the need to see them or the need to shoot them?

Made in roughly 48 hours as part of RMIT Jam and GMTK Jam.
Theme of game jams were: Masks, and Dual Purpose Mechanics

NO AUDIO - UPDATE 1.3 
NO MAC VERSION - UPDATE 1.3

w,a,s,d = Move 
space (hold) = use a mask 
mouse & left click = aim & shoot

R = restart
Escape or alt f4 = exit
